featured.text: With a good ______ of both Chinese and English, Miss Lin was assigned the task of oral interpretation for the visiting American delegation.
Writing term papers and giving oral reports are typical course _____ for college students.
The coastal peoples have long passed on knowledge from generation to generation through oral traditions, and totem poles were the traditional way of telling the story of an individual family or clan.

definition.zh_def: 口頭的；與口語或口腔有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the mouth or spoken rather than written.
definition.example: The teacher gave an oral presentation to the class.
